# From src directory
python train.py sd_audioldm --loss_type disc --epochs 10
python train.py sd_audioldm --loss_type dv --epochs 10  
python train.py ddpm_night2day --loss_type kliep --epochs 5

# Models saved as:
# checkpoints/disc/sd_audioldm_disc_mi_model_best.pt
# checkpoints/dv/sd_audioldm_dv_mi_model_best.pt
# checkpoints/kliep/ddpm_night2day_kliep_mi_model_best.pt
